attributes.action: Require a Register for Telecommunications to Publish EMF Radiation
attributes.additional_details: A public register for telecommunication mast towers EMF radiation levels is needed.  Other industries are expected under Environmental Law, Public Health and Health and Safety to operate within national and international standards and even to publish for controls, management, obligation and accountability.  Telecommunication companies have many of their mast towers in residential areas and do not publish public the EMF radiation levels past or present and a threat to public health.
attributes.background: EMF radiation in unsafe levels is a threat to public health and safety.  A public register for telecommunications to publish EMF radiation from mast towers or similar is paramount for public health and authorities to monitor under national and international laws.
